name: I Was Made for Lovin' You
desc: Tonight I wanna it all to you In the There's so I wanna do And tonight I wanna lay it at your 'Cause , I was made for you And girl, you were for me REF: I was made for lovin' you baby You made for lovin' me And I can't get of you baby Can you enough of me Tonight I wanna see it in your Feel the There's something that drives me And tonight we're gonna make it all true 'Cause , you were made for me And girl I was for you REF (x2) Oh, can't get , oh, oh
